013package org.apache.juneau.annotation;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.collections.JsonMap.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.ThrowableUtils.*;
017import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ArrayUtils.copyOf;
018import static java.util.Arrays.*;
019
020import java.lang.annotation.*;
021import java.lang.reflect.*;
022import java.util.*;
023
024import org.apache.juneau.collections.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.common.internal.*;
026import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
027
028/**
029 * A concrete implementation of an annotation.
030 *
031 * <p>
032 * Follows the standard Java conventions for equality and hashcode calculation for annotations.
033 * Equivalent annotations defined programmatically and declaratively should match for equality and hashcode calculation.
034 *
035 * <p>
036 * For performance reasons, the hashcode is calculated one time and cached at the end of object creation.
037 * Constructors must call the {@link #postConstruct()} method after all fields have been set to trigger this calculation.
038 *
039 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
040 * </ul>
041 */
042public class AnnotationImpl implements Annotation {
043
044   private final Class<? extends Annotation> annotationType;
045   private final String[] description;
046   private int hashCode = -1;
047
048   /**
049    * Constructor.
050    *
051    * @param b The builder used to instantiate the fields of this class.
052    */
053   public AnnotationImpl(AnnotationBuilder<?> b) {
054      this.annotationType = b.annotationType;
055      this.description = copyOf(b.description);
056   }
057
058   /**
059    * This method must be called at the end of initialization to calculate the hashCode one time.
060    */
061   protected void postConstruct() {
062      this.hashCode = AnnotationUtils.hashCode(this);
063   }
064
065   /**
066    * Implements the {@link Annotation#annotationType()} method for child classes.
067    *
068    * @return This class.
069    */
070   @Override /* Annotation */
071   public Class<? extends Annotation> annotationType() {
072      return annotationType;
073   }
074
075   /**
076    * Returns the annotation description.
077    *
078    * @return the annotation description.
079    * @since 9.2.0
080    */
081   public String[] description() {
082       return description;
083   }
084
085   @Override /* Object */
086   public int hashCode() {
087      if (hashCode == -1)
088         throw new IllegalArgumentException("Programming error. postConstruct() was never called on annotation.");
089      return hashCode;
090   }
091
092   @Override /* Object */
093   public boolean equals(Object o) {
094      if (!annotationType.isInstance(o))
095         return false;
096      return AnnotationUtils.equals(this, (Annotation)o);
097   }
098
099   /**
100    * Returns this annotation as a map of key/value pairs.
101    *
102    * <p>
103    * Useful for debugging.
104    *
105    * @return This annotation as a map of key/value pairs.
106    */
107   public JsonMap toMap() {
108      JsonMap m = create();
109      stream(annotationType().getDeclaredMethods())
110         .filter(x->x.getParameterCount() == 0 && x.getDeclaringClass().isAnnotation())
111         .sorted(Comparator.comparing(Method::getName))
112         .forEach(x -> m.append(x.getName(), Utils.safeSupplier(()->x.invoke(this))));
113      return m;
114   }
115
116   @Override /* Object */
117   public String toString() {
118      return toMap().asString();
119   }
120}
